mapper.sql: id, orderId, hsId, skCompanyId, huankuankDate, huankuanAmount, huankuanInterest, huankuanFee, tsc
mapper.select:
select t1.id, t1.orderId, t1.hsId, t1.skCompanyId, t1.huankuankDate, t1.huankuanAmount, t1.huankuanInterest, t1.huankuanFee, t1.tsc from hs_ying_huankuan t1 LEFT JOIN hs_ying_huankuan_map map on t1.id = map.huankuanId LEFT JOIN hs_ying_fukuan t2 on map.fukuanId = t2.id
t1.orderId=#{orderId} t1.hsId=#{hsId} t1.skCompanyId=#{skCompanyId} t1.huankuanDate=#{huankuanDate} t1.huankuanAmount=#{huankuanAmount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hs_ying_huankuan ( id, orderId, hsId, skCompanyId, huankuankDate, huankuanAmount, huankuanInterest, huankuanFee, tsc) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{skCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{huankuankDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{huankuanAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{huankuanInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{huankuanFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into hs_ying_huankuan
id, orderId, hsId, skCompanyId, huankuankDate, huankuanAmount, huankuanInterest, huankuanFee, tsc,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{skCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{huankuankDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{huankuanAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{huankuanInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{huankuanFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update: UPDATE hs_ying_huankuan SET orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, skCompanyId = #{skCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, huankuankDate = #{huankuankDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, huankuanAmount = #{huankuanAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
